title: endhuku dhayaraadhuraa
sahitya:
enduku dayarAdurA shrI rAmacandra nIk-



anupallavi



sandadiyani maracitiv indulEvO nIk-



caraNam 1



t rani bhavanIradhi Aradi sairimpa nEraka bhayamondaga

pankajapatra-

     nIruvita mallADaga jUci cUci nIradAbha sharIra nirupamashUra

nIk-



caraNam 2



sareku durviSaya sAgara manubhavincu vAri celimi sEyanEraka

mEnu

     shrI rAma sagamAye niTTi nanu jUci nIrajadaLa nayana

nirmalApa ghana nIk-



caraNam 3



jAgEla idi samayamu gAdu cEsitE nEgati balukavayyA shrI rAma

nI vEgAni

     dari lEdayyA d nasharaNya tyAgarAjavinuta tArakacarita nIk-
